authors.name: Joshua Z Levin

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ge0r","text":"This protocol can be used on flash-frozen or RNAlater-preserved brain cortex. It is based on a previously published method (1) with a few modifications including, 1) Adding Recombinant RNase Inhibitor into the EZ prep lysis buffer in the incubation steps. 2) Passing the lysate through a 40 µm cell strainer after the tissue grinding. 3) Doing an additional wash. 4) Passing the nuclei suspension through a 20 µm filter before the final counting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"2s0gt","text":"Simmons SK, Adiconis X, Haywood N, Parker J, Lin Z, Liao Z, Tuncali I, Al'Khafaji AM, Shin A, Jagadeesh K, Gosik K, Gatzen M, Smith JT, El Kodsi DN, Kuras Y, Baecher-Allan C, Serrano GE, Beach TG, Garimella K, Rozenblatt-Rosen O, Regev A, Dong X, Scherzer CR, Levin JZ. Experimental and Computational Methods for Allelic Imbalance Analysis from Single-Nucleus RNA-seq Data. bioRxiv [Preprint]. 2024 Aug 16:2024.08.13.607784. doi: 10.1101/2024.08.13.607784. PMID: 39185246; PMCID: PMC11343128.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fahid","text":"Add  of cold Lysis buffer1 into an empty douncing tube and keep on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6pvst","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hq7l","text":"Drop the frozen tissue into the douncing tube and submerge it in the lysis buffer. Start immediately grinding the tissue with pestle A 25 times or until resistance disappears. Continue grinding with pestle B 25 times. Pass the lysate through a 40 µm filter into a new   tube on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":268,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6epp6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9csnh","text":"Rinse the douncing tube with the remaining   Lysis buffer1, pass through the same filter and into the same   tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bki58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c2u8","text":"Mix the lysate well by inverting the tube 5 times and incubate on ice for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2ci7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62e5k","text":"Pellet the nuclei by  . Carefully aspirate the supernatant and set the nuclei pellet on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rsjn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49ovk","text":"Resuspend the nuclei by adding  Lysis buffer2 and mix well with a P1000 pipette. Add the remaining   Lysis buffer2, mix well by inverting, and incubate on ice for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":99,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":163,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq07t","text":"Pellet the nuclei by  as in step 6. Carefully aspirate the supernatant and set the nuclei pellet on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F1E46F30756411EF95440A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djcqs","text":"Resuspend the pellet with   Nuclei resuspension buffer, filter through a 20 µm filter, and collect into a 1.5 ml Eppendorf tube. Count the nuclei using Cellometer K2 (Nexcelom Bioscience) with the AO stain. Keep on ice until downstream processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9c0sq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
